snippet.title: NARUTO X BORUTO Ultimate Ninja STORM CONNECTIONS — Special Story Mode Trailer
snippet.description:
Unveiling the Special Story Mode! 
Witness the perils that engulf Boruto and the heirs of the shinobi realm in the face of the Fifth Great Ninja War! 
Who are the two new characters that hold the key to this story…? 
#NSC

Follow Naruto Video Games on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/narutovideogame
